current_past_clients: Amazon or AWS or Amazon Web Services

first_degree_approved_vendor_posts: Should generate first-degree approved vendor message
Should include 'We are an approved vendor for [COMPANY NAME]' in message
first_degree_regular_posts: Should NOT include 'approved vendor' in message
current_past_client_posts: Should generate special message mentioning previous relationship
Should include 'We previously supported [COMPANY NAME] as an approved vendor' in message
excluded_client_posts: Should be marked as 'BLOCKED' in CSV export
Should have connection message set to 'BLOCKED - Company is excluded'
neutral_client_posts: Should not be marked as blocked
